website_summaries.verdict: This 3-in-1 device can blow and mulch as well as vacuum.
pros: Heavy-duty blower at a decent price
Sucks up leaves into a bag and grinds them down into mulch
Comes with a collection bag with a zipper that empties at the back like a mower clipping bag, and a shoulder strap
Includes a separate, wide vacuum tube
cons: Electric and cannot be used without a power cord

customer_reviews.title: BACK SAVER!
customer_reviews.text: I FEEL LIKE TIM THE TOOL MAN TAYLOR WITH THIS THING! IT IS POWERFUL AND EASY TO USE. I AM NOT GETTING ANY YOUNGER AND MY CHILDREN ARE ALL GROWN UP AND MOVED AWAY....WHO ELSE IS GOING TO RAKE LEAVES? I GIVE THIS PRODUCT A 5 STAR BECAUSE IT TRULY IS A GREAT MACHINE. YOU CAN NEVER GO WRONG WITH B&D.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Burchard

customer_reviews.title: VERY GOOD BUY !!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am impressed with this machine....it is easy to switch from the blower to the vacuum. I have several trees in my yard that includes oak, maple, black walnut and catalpa ( which I will be cutting the Catalpa trees down ). I haven't had any issues or problems with this blower/vac at all. I do wish that it had a longer strap and that the bag was a little bigger but you can't have everything. All in all a very good buy !!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: BUG 1952

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement for brooms when picking up leaves.
customer_reviews.text: Really works well. I am a 69 year old woman, and it is not as light weight as I had hoped, but is manageable. It is the only way to quickly clean our pool deck made of pavers. Assembles very easily. Bag is very durable. Will actually pick up small twigs as well as leaves of all sizes. I use it at least twice a week.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Strong

customer_reviews.title: More powerful with the concentrator OFF
customer_reviews.text: Finding a powerful blower is becoming quite the task. The "cheaper" one I have just didn't cut it. I found this one to be the same. Weak with little "push" and a lot of blow by at the intake, so at this point I was considering returning it. Granted I was trying to move semi-wet leaves but still it could only move small amounts at a time. So as a test I popped of the concentrator tip tip and boy did this thing wake up. Good air flow into the intake and now it moves even wet leaves with ease. I'll let the leaves dry out some more and then try the vacuum out.
customer_reviews.author: Chris in Virginia

customer_reviews.title: This is IT !
customer_reviews.text: If you want a GOOD blower/vac , this is it... its heafty and industrial.. not a el cheapo plastic crap.. its blows leafs and sucks them like crazy! Plus, its electric.. no gas to fill and smell your hands and garage up.. it ALWAYS starts.. no noise of a two stroke motor!! ( very annoying to neighbors.. i.e. Me!). Its a great machine and im a stickler for quality.. im old were like that. Good bargan for bout 60 bucks for sure!
customer_reviews.author: GARY CULY

customer_reviews.title: Item Broke after 10 minutes of use
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product. Honestly I would have given it a higher rating had I returned it on time but now im stuck with a giant paper weight. It worked beautifully for the 10 minutes it did work however but it stopped sucking and it now only functions as a leaf blower. I already own a leaf blower, a much stronger leaf blower. I bought this because it was supposed to make bagging leaves easier as well as save the environment. Hopefully they contact me and give me a second chance to return this or at least give me a replacement. Hopefully that one works and I can write a new review of that ones performance.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Moran

customer_reviews.title: I hate leaf blowers
customer_reviews.text: I hate leaf blowers and this isn't a very good one. However, I bought it for the VAC and that works well. Great for garden clean-up too. The fact that it lacks the power of a gas model is a good thing. It doesn't pick up acorns or gravel which can damage the impeller. It is not a heavy-duty machine but very useful for a small to medium yard. The impeller is cast aluminum and seems to be holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: shasta60

customer_reviews.title: Good Blower
customer_reviews.text: Really good blower. Not quite as powerful as I thought it was going to be, but it does get the job done. Metal impeller chews the leave and small sticks up in a hurry. If your have a lot of leaves to blow, and don't want to buy a gas blower, I would recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Stay away! You have been warned!
customer_reviews.text: My third leaf blower. All of which have been Black and Decker. This one has a major design flaw. Number one, you have to keep a screwdriver on hand to detach the blower? Ridiculous! Also, the pieces do not easily come off when switching from mulcher and blower. I spend more time trying to take the pieces off then I save by not raking and such! Ridiculous again. Would not recommend at all!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica D

customer_reviews.title: Be prepared to get dirty if you are using the mulching function
customer_reviews.text: While I was/and am, excited about the mulching aspect of this machine, it a QUITE messy! Be prepared to get dirty if you are using the mulching function. The instructions and parts that came with it do not really match up, so it's kinda confusing to put together. The bag inserts for the mulching are worthless and were trashed. The nice thing is that it has plenty of hand-holds and the cross the body strap is very nice for those who cannot lift a lot.
customer_reviews.author: MTByrd

customer_reviews.title: Really good machine!
customer_reviews.text: This machine works great! I used the vacuum on low speed for leaves because on high speed it was picking up small rocks. It has a metal blade for mulching leaves and it will even handle small twigs with no problem. The only issue i have with the machine is how the bag works. You have to keep the bag from kinking where it connects to the machine or you lose a lot of suction.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this mulcher
customer_reviews.text: I love this mulcher. My husband gave me so much grief buying this saying it will be a ""cheap home owners piece of garbage"....and boy was he wrong! I cleaned up all of the leaves around my pool area in no time flat! The power, ease of use and set up was beyond my expectations! I SELDOM DO REVIEWS....BUT JUST HAD TO GIVE BLACK AND DECKER A 5 STAR! BEST PRODUCT EVER!
customer_reviews.author: vickie

customer_reviews.title: First thought..
customer_reviews.text: Recieved today and it came with everything it said. Very curious to see how well it does on garage floors with a mat. Our entire garage floor is covered and in the tiny squares are needles and little leaves. I'll update after its assembled and used. High hopes. Update: This thing is so awesome. We were tracking so much grass throughout the house after mowing and this used as a blower doesn't leave a piece of grass on the drive or walkway. Definitely worth 60 points bucks. No its not cordless but we have a million extension cords so it was fine for us and a fraction of the cost of a cordless.
customer_reviews.author: hilary and my two cents

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Does the job but manage your expectations. This isn't going to be the industrial strength powerhouse you see pro gardeners and facility keepers wielding but it gets the job done. This thing is meant for dry leaves. My tree drops these thick twig things that it manages OK but I have to work a little to get them all, whether blowing or mulching. Also, they cause the intake to clog sometimes. If you're using it as a mulcher, wear a dust mask.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Great.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome and still going great after 6 months. Great as blower and vacuum. Use disposable bags for messy stuff and reusable bag for dry leaves. I've used it on wet leaves, partially decomposed stuff and sand.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Relible Unit
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one. I think I have had all of this type of units in the past. This particular brand has done pretty good. The bag didn't fall apart every month, and yes they still sell that brand; with the same problem 6 years later. Other bands the switch breaks down and they did send me a recall notice, thank goodness. I was watching sparks one Saturday I finished up using. That Monday I noticed a email . it said, please stop using may cause a fire. Over all a strong 4.75 stars
customer_reviews.author: Art

customer_reviews.title: Turn leaves into mulch
customer_reviews.text: Makes picking up leaves a breeze and gives you organic mulch for the garden. I use the attachment to use a garbage can which means I can cover a large area in one go.
customer_reviews.author: D. Leiter

customer_reviews.title: Powerful, easy to use and convert
customer_reviews.text: Would rather have a cordless, but they are just not powerful enough. This corded one is powerful both for leaf vac and blower. Read the directions and it’s easy to assemble. Easy to convert. I can feel the leaf bag as it gets full. Easy to dump into a plastic bag. I’ve only had it 4 months, so I don’t know about durability. I had a B&D hedge trimmer and it stopped working after 1 year. I took it to a B&D repair facility and they just gave me a new one and it has worked well. I use it daily.
customer_reviews.author: Miller

customer_reviews.title: I was impressed at the beginning, then I started ...
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed at the beginning, then I started having trouble with the blower staying on. It took me a little while to figure out what was going on. The nozzle does not attach itself well to the blower and when this happens the blower stops working. It seems to be a safety shut off, but I need to keep pressure on the nozzle for it to work properly. Aside from that, its ok!
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: Just What I needed. Used solely as a vaccum
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I need. I use it to grind up leaves in areas on my 2.5+ acre proper where I'm unable to use my lawnmower to mulch the leaves. I use it on the low speed to mulch leaves and it works great. A little dusty but not intolerable and is to be expected with the job the tool is doing. Lastly, I use this solely as a vaccum to mulch leaves. Don't plan to ever use the blower parts. In all, I love this tool and definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Roland Odume

customer_reviews.title: Used maybe ten times before it died.
customer_reviews.text: Piece of crap. Bought it last year in January and only used it a few times. Needed to use it the other day and when I turned it on it on it just died . I had a different brand previously that lasted for years , and it only broke because something got stuck in it while vacuuming .
customer_reviews.author: rose

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this blower/vac primarily to blow debris off my deck, patio and porch. It has worked very well so far. The vacuum works well also, but I do wish it came with a smaller attachment to get into tighter areas better. The unit has just the right amount of power I need to do what I intended to use it for. I also use it to blow out my garage from time to time. The tires on my car seem to track in debris that eventually makes its way either into my house or on the floor mates of my car. It also helps to eliminate cobwebs in my garage.
customer_reviews.author: Tiger

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: The blower is absolutely useless, noisy and unusable. Do not recommend. I love Black & Decker, but not in this case. I thru it right in the trash, and as you can see, they are selling used ones, because people are returning them. In addition, the box is not intended to go thru multiple transfers with the delivery system, and arrived with a damage handle which I used black electrical tape to firm up.
customer_reviews.author: TitaniumSpecial

customer_reviews.title: Beats raking
customer_reviews.text: Just starting my second season with this unit and I have very few complaints. I wish there was a better way to carry the collection bag. That's about it. I read a review before buying this unit that complained about it clogging when mulching wet leaves. I have had that happen once, but you just have to set your pace to match the machine and you'll have no problems. On the whole I am very satisfied and would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: ralph perkins

customer_reviews.title: Top Flight!
customer_reviews.text: I had the older generation model for about five years. I actually kept that one and ordered this newer one. I just wanted to have a blower and leaf eater/mulcher without changing out the parts lol. Spoiled I know but fellas we have to do that once in awhile if we can afford it! This new Black & Decker is stronger, more powerful and mulches the leaves/small branches/bark even better. I am thoroughly impressed! For an electric machine it is excellent!!!!! This is a great purchase if you can deal with the extension cord. A tip, just knot tie the extension cord to the blower/mulcher so the cord doesn't disconnect.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Ray

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This thing was awesome. I have a stone/rock bed lining my front yard and it had a ton of dead leaves in between all the rocks. Doing it by hand was out of the option as it would have taken at least a couple of hours. When I used this thing, it took 30 minutes. It vacuumed all the leaves up leaving the rocks behind. Now I have a clean and crisp front yard thanks to this. Assembly was very easy. 5-10 minutes Maneuverability is tough since it's quite big, but it is also very lightweight for it's size.
customer_reviews.author: Elliott F

customer_reviews.title: Fine product with one of the all-time worst instruction manuals
customer_reviews.text: The product get's 5 stars. The instruction manual gets less than one star but once one can figure out how to remove the bottom fan guard, what results is a high power vacuum shredder. It's hard to believe that so fine a product would have such an inadequate instruction manual. Fortunately, there are enough youtube instructions that once one finds the right one, one learns that the fan guard is removed by using a screw driver to push the internal release button.
customer_reviews.author: Lester Kallus

customer_reviews.title: Cuts work time tremendously
customer_reviews.text: Wow, this blower/vacuum/mulcher SUCKS... I mean that in a good way! Prepare to get filthy & when emptying bag, remember to zip it back up before vacuuming again. It even sucked up a small mini football and the it up, but I got it out before any damage may have been done. It was a little heavier than what I expected, but I handled fine.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable garbage
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this for only a few months and used it like 5 times. It’s great when it works but this afternoon when I turned it on, it comes to life for like 2 seconds before the engine cuts off. Tried using it through various electrical outlets, same outcome. The warranty period for Amazon has passed and there are no local Black and Decker service center here. Last time I’m buying lawn equipment from them.
customer_reviews.author: I. Masduki

customer_reviews.title: No race horse, but does shred the leaves.
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Does an awesome shred. LEAVES MUST BE ALL DRY! I have the typical fall leaves and we used to always rake and bag, rake and bag. I actually save a few shreds for the plants about the yard. Carefull with the twigs larger than a pencil. will clog the tube. The Blower works great. Access to the button is a huge pain in the ASS! Butter knife through the slot or a strong twig to push the button through the slot needed. I can see the slot being needed to keep accidental seperations from happening.
customer_reviews.author: nj.firefighter

customer_reviews.title: Works well on vacuum mode for sure
customer_reviews.text: This thing really works well on vacuum mode. That is mostly why I bought it. We have artificial turf with lots of trees around and I find it easier and cleaner to vacuum up the stuff rather than blow it into my neighbors yard. The bag cleans out reasonably easy and very little dust gets out if it. A little cumbersome but way better than using a shop vac.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This arrived on time
customer_reviews.text: This arrived on time was pretty easy to put together use out of the box switching between the blower and the mulcher not a big deal to switch out the only thing I can say is that it’s quieter on the multcher . when the blowers on it’s got a high pitch whining sound to it that’s very high-pitched but otherwise it’s been working great as a mulcher. Would have gotten a 5 if it was not for the high winning pitch when blower is in use.
customer_reviews.author: P.I.

customer_reviews.title: This tool is an autumn life-changer!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best yard/lawn care items I ever purchased. For both leaf blowing and leaf vacuuming it works like a dream. It's not too heavy and it's very easy to manage. Using this blower/mulcher cuts the time we have to spend on autumn leaves by literally more than half. I don't know why I waited so long to stop raking and start blowing/mulching. I can't recommend this tool highly enough!
customer_reviews.author: zencatx

customer_reviews.title: The best vacuum so far... if working
customer_reviews.text: I've used this on and off for days at a time since 2018. Usually just to keep up with the fence line, taking up leaves and maintaining the ground Yesterday, after using it for a couple of days for a few hours each, it suddenly stopped working I'm not sure if a circuit in the engine is out, or if it's the cable or whatever. It's completely clean and hasn't seen TOO much use I loved this thing... when it worked. Might update if it gets fixed
customer_reviews.author: Sheldon

customer_reviews.title: This thing works great as both a blower and vacuum
customer_reviews.text: This thing works great as both a blower and vacuum. It has chewed up everything with no issue and even digests small sticks and twigs from trees. The small fabric bag works well and is very easy to empty. I purchased the tube and can attachment but have yet to use it since the bag keeps me mobile and is easy to empty into the yard waste bags. Quality is good, would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: R. COLTON

customer_reviews.title: Blow YES - Suck NO
customer_reviews.text: This has worked well as a leaf blower - but the mulching feature jams constantly. I have a magnolia tree and this simply can't handle the leaves. It immediately clogs the tube and can't suck up any more. Buy it to blow but only plan on mulching if you have small leaves.
customer_reviews.author: ScottinStep

customer_reviews.title: This thing is a leaf sucking machine
customer_reviews.text: Wow. This is a game changer. Glad I didn't buy the cheapest one out there and got this one. It's great at getting leaves and doesn't bother the rocks or acorns. The bag is designed to open inside of a disposable bag with ease. Nothing to complain about. This thing works 100% as described and the time savings plus less effort on my back makes it worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Nyck

customer_reviews.title: Not very well made.
customer_reviews.text: Worked pretty well at first, then quit after just four uses. It would vacuum up the leaves but the Mulcher quit working. Aside from that, it has a really weird design where you have to hold two straps over your shoulder at the same time . I could live with that, as long as the unit was working, but since it quit, I will be looking for something better designed. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: HariShabad

customer_reviews.title: Works great, for most things
customer_reviews.text: Ok, the main reason I got this was to pick up mesquite pods. It did not do that. BUT, I have plenty else to pick up in the yard, and it does do that. Wet and dry leaves, and smaller pods (from Willow tree). Works best to blow into a pile, then vacuum. The thing I don't like is the mulch flying out of the joint of the vacuum. It's not bad for the yard; I'm just unfortunately allergic to my yard, so this part isn't good. But it is good for lessening my time working. For those with the mesquite trees, I discovered there's a such thing as a rubber broom. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: SlapHappy

customer_reviews.title: bag is cheap, flimsy, probably won't last long
customer_reviews.text: The leaf vacuum works well and mulches leaves into small pieces. My problem is the bag. It's made with cheap fabric that's too flimsy for the job. It probably won't last 2 seasons. Our old Toro leaf blower/vacuum had a very thick canvas bag and both the machine and bag lasted for 20 years. I hope Black + Decker replaces the bag with the thickest canvas available.
customer_reviews.author: Oggi

customer_reviews.title: This is a Toy NOT a Tool
customer_reviews.text: If you simply want to clear dry leaves off your driveway, this will probably do. Anything other than that, well good luck. Last year I bought a Homelite 26cc gasoline leaf blower. It's about the same price as this thing, but it really moves leaves. Does a great job. However, it's messy (have to mix gas with special oil) and it's noisy. So I went looking for a better alternative. This thing supposedly had 250 mph wind speed with far less noise. Quite maybe, but move leaves forget it. I packed this thing up and returned it less than hour after it was delivered.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne B

customer_reviews.title: Great little tool, especially for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome for small (and probably other sized) gravel! My house has poorly maintained gravel due to the previous owners, and this thing helps so much; sucking up and mulching almost everything that doesn’t belong in the gravel, and leaving all the rocks behind. Seems robust, and I’ve been able to get probably 20-30 uses from it and the reusable cloth bag without issue. Helps to wear something over your face while you use it on dry debris, as a lot of dust will be generated!
customer_reviews.author: Alex D.

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: This is a poor design. You cannot do both blow and vacuum without having to play around and move bits and pieces. Would be much better if you could just flick a switch and have the vacuum then turn into a blower. There are much better products out there, should have paid a bit more attention to detail and I would not have purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Saville

customer_reviews.title: Happy happy happy
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I would only say I did one thing wrong in purchasing this one. Accessories were a problem for me. The canvas bag to sit up for leaves, etc comes with a round flat piece of plastic to insert in the canvas to keep it up and circular. I have yet to find anyplace for the plastic to go. Second they offer a B&D Leaf Collection System. It attaches from your blower to a trash can via a cloth top. For regular size trash cans. You apparently haul the trash can with you. Another system than mulching system. Don't waste your money getting both like I did.
customer_reviews.author: nancy2

customer_reviews.title: A waste!
customer_reviews.text: I dunno yall. I expected such great things from this from the reviews. It is heavy to me ( a lady) and the does...not that much!! I have the battery operated one and it honeslty does the same job! I was expecting some powerful blower from the reviews. It is SO LOUD. and does barely nothing. The higher the power is the louder it gets and still... I don't recommend. I end up going back to my battery operated one which gives problems but still better than this
customer_reviews.author: Josiah B

customer_reviews.title: Good for relatively small areas, or maybe totally dry leaves.
customer_reviews.text: My appraisal may not be altogether fair, as the leaves were slightly damp when I sucked them up into the mulching end of the unit. I used one of the disposable bags and it was about half full, fell off the exhaust end of the unit and I was unable to get it to stay fastened to the unit again. For small areas that are back in corners or hard to reach areas, I say it is good. For large areas of lawn, I shall just ride my lawn mower around and round to chop up the leaves (my mower is not a “mulching” mower.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Not 250 mph!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this B&D blower/vac for about a month now and am not impressed. It claims to have a blower output of up to 250 mph, but I think they meant 250 kmh. It doesn't work as well as the Toro I had for blower operation. I have not used the vac yet, but judging by the amount of air blowing out the bottom of the unit, I'm guessing that won't work well either. More review after I try the vac.
customer_reviews.author: dutchman

customer_reviews.title: It stinks for the price
customer_reviews.text: It’s not a good buy. We picked this up from the PO today, then used it. About 20-30 minutes in, my husband tried to empty it. The zipper broke and now the bag is unusable. That’s after owning this product for less than an hour. Let’s see if amazon help us tomorrow. The suction isn’t great either. You gotta point directly one at a time to the leaves to pick it up like a vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: The Mom Mess

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought one I used it for 20 minutes and turned off, After that it would turn on and off every 5 minutes I ask for the replacement the next day was at my door, try it and works great I was gonna write a bad review but the replacement showed up sooner than I can get my phone, great service, I'm very pleased, but above all it works great, well build and good design all the way around. Now I'm doing mulch and keeping the yard clean
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Great blower and vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what some of the other negative reviews were talking about. I have use this to blow and vacuum leaves with great success. It is making my fall leaf work much easier this year. Plenty of power.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Bedford

customer_reviews.title: ... this for a few months now and it's a terrific timesaver. The quality is good
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for a few months now and it's a terrific timesaver. The quality is good, and the standard cloth bag seems to hold up so far. I have not yet tried the "disposable" bags. Excellent performance in both mulcher and blower configurations. Biggest complaint (so far) is that the mulching intake tube housing is becoming more loose in the attachment seat. I think a bit of friction tape may help that.
customer_reviews.author: Nukta K

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Bought my first B&D Leafhog over 20 years ago and it still works great, except the bag has a hole in it. A mouse chewed on it over the winter. I'm going to replace the bag. But I got the new one so my wife could help. We have a lot of leaves. I bought a Worx brand a couple of years ago, but if the leaves are wet, which they always are here, it clogs up to the point of being inoperable. The Leafhog sucks them up wet or dry! I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: D. Giachino

customer_reviews.title: Good buy but could use better design
customer_reviews.text: Single mom wanting to be able to blow off my driveway or mulch up leaves on my own. It’s light weight but bulky. The cord has a tendency to fall out/come unplugged from the device. It works and sucks and blows great when I can get past the other 2 issues.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Holder

customer_reviews.title: Say hello to your new lawn care BFF
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. I loathe yard work. We have massive Texas oak trees pit front and the gardens were stuffed full of leaves when we moved in. This thing is powerful!!! The vacuum means business and it’s dummy proof. It does a great job with leaves. It’s easy to switch back and forth between functions. The bags are great. I love sucking up and then it mulches it up that’s perfect for our compost trash! Five stars!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get them before they become unavailable
customer_reviews.text: You can purchase others, you can purchase battery powered units but you will never find a better engineered or built unit. It will surpass your expectations in both blowing and sucking up leaves and debri. It is designed to permit you to pickup leaves and debri right over the top of rocks (the velocity and vacuum is designed for it) and the highest setting does not pickup rocks or gravel. It will pickup redwood bark chips, mulch, etc. and the steel blade easily pulverizes it. It really permits you to vacuum right around the plants.
customer_reviews.author: J. Goldsberry

customer_reviews.title: Lovin' this thing!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! I bought it for the vacuum leaf shredding part, and it's great! I live in CA and have a lot of outdoor space. This allows me to vacuum up like to would any other room, and it's 1000x better than sweeping. My only request from a mgf standpoint would be something slightly smaller, or an attachment that might be narrower, but it's not too big for a woman to use, and does a great job!
customer_reviews.author: V. Hearne

customer_reviews.title: Only works 10% of the time
customer_reviews.text: It only works about 10% of the time. It is cumbersome to maneuver and incredibly frustrating. It sucks up some leaves, stops sucking, then when I turn it off all the leaves I thought it sucked up come back out. After doing this about 10 times it will start working for awhile, then the process starts all over. I end up covered in dust, choking through my mask, with hardly anything to show for it.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah H

customer_reviews.title: Does a good job mulching leaves.
customer_reviews.text: Had to find a you tube video to figure out how to put it together. After we got it together realized there was a part missing. But decided to keep as it was not a crucial piece but would have made it work somewhat better. It is a little heavy to hold while using. We bought it to keep leaves and debris off the patio and it does a good job.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Great blower
customer_reviews.text: My first leaf blower! I brought the attachment to blow the leaves right into the trash can, I suggest everyone gets that attachment as well. I am a senior woman and this product wasn’t too heavy for me!!!
customer_reviews.author: Zilmag

customer_reviews.title: A big workhorse in a little package that easily sucks up leaves instead of laboring over raking.
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is awesome! Lots of power and great suction. Easily gets those leaves that are hard to reach and makes cleaning so much easier. The bag size is ample and holds a lot. We have a small amount of leaves from a neighbor's tree that needs routine cleanup in our garden. Our daughter tried this at her home where she has a LOT of oak trees and was thrilled that this would save time from raking and bagging. Overall very pleased with this little workhorse!
customer_reviews.author: N. NickTop Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: Metal impeller makes this a great tool
customer_reviews.text: This is a great leaf blower. I use it mostly in suction mode to pick up leaves and small debris. The suction is very strong and can pick up small rocks if you are not careful. The metal impeller chops everything up to small shreds. You can fit a log of leaves in the bag. I would highly recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: J. Tompkins

customer_reviews.title: Great yard vac.
customer_reviews.text: Works great, I have no trees in my yard but all the home around my for lots of trees and it seems like most of the leaves end up in my yard, after 3 months of piling up in my yard the Black & Decker work like all the infor said it did clean up my front yard in 30 mins. What a time save.
customer_reviews.author: LFC

customer_reviews.title: Great Blower,Vac.&mulcher
customer_reviews.text: I have read all the reviews and decided I would give this Blower, Vacuum & Mulcher a try. Was not disappointed with this Black & Decker BV6000! Yes it is a bit heavy but not that bad, when in Vacuum Mulch it gets dusty, but too be expected! And what I like also is the fans impellor is metal. I will say my yard is pea gravel so probably more dust. Am glad I purchased this product!
customer_reviews.author: Jones

customer_reviews.title: 3 and out.
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased 3 of these in the last year. Mainly because I wanted to give B&D the benefit of the doubt but this product is absolute garbage. The first one came with missing parts, the second one just died while sucking up leaves and the third one chooses when it wants to work and when it doesn't. The most recent issue is that it goes in and out of power while sucking up leaves. This product is really not worth buying even for the relatively competitive price.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Works as well as I expected. I originally bought an off brand from China with the same specs as this one, but it arrived DOA. I returned it no problem on Amazon and went with the Black and Decker model instead. Stick with the name brands! Note, at 250mph, this could be too powerful if you plan to vacuum leaves over lava rock. It could suck up the rocks wrecking the mulcher.
customer_reviews.author: Brian A

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this!
customer_reviews.text: Opened the blower vac and started assembling and the first thing we tried was the vacuum which is what we needed most. We were never able to assemble the vacuum so called the dealer and they talked to my husband and were totally unable to help. It was impossible to fit it on and obviously a defect. It was made to go on without any trouble but that was a joke! So frustrated
customer_reviews.author: diana blair

customer_reviews.title: Did not receive all attachments.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble. Unfortunately, like many others, our package did not include the leaf blower attachment so we are not able to blow slags at all. The mulching attachments worked the first two times we used but I am worried about durability as others have mentioned. If I could do it all over again, I would buy something more expensive but sturdy. Getting a machine that has all of the needed parts and lasts long will pay off to be the better long term investment.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Dalton

customer_reviews.title: this unit is the best thing since sliced bread
customer_reviews.text: I have never had a vacuum yard tool before, this unit is the best thing since sliced bread. Not only will in pick up the dry leaves but also wet ones, grass clippings, small twigs ... it grinds and bags with ease. Have an extra 100 foot extension cord attached because you'll want to keep going without delay. It makes yard cleanup a breeze. This unit is so aggressive I've had to scape mud out of the impeller housing a couple of times so carry a long skinny screwdriver quick cleanup.
customer_reviews.author: L.E.N

customer_reviews.title: It runs like a champ and is very powerful
customer_reviews.text: This thing had far exceeded my expectations. It runs like a champ and is very powerful. It's not only great as a leaf blower, but the leaf vacuum/mulcher is what makes this thing so amazing. It picks up even wet leaves out of shrubbery and reduces them to a fine mulch that is easily removed from the collection bag. Very useful tool!
customer_reviews.author: Clay M.

customer_reviews.title: Good product but it's no not working correctly.
customer_reviews.text: Loved it but now the engine cycles. Don't know if it's a faulty electrical connection or a connection on the handle. Once you define the amount of air, by turning the knob, the engine cycles from that level to off and then back to this level. I have inspected the wiring, played with the physical connection - handle into the fan unit, changed the angle of the machine, etc... but it consistently cycles from on to off. Would greatly appreciate anyone's input on solving this problem or identify if its a product issue. Bought the product in April of 2017 and have used it 12 times - one would think it would work for years.
customer_reviews.author: chasman5

customer_reviews.title: Great blower/mulcher!
customer_reviews.text: I have five large trees surrounding my house and wanted to get something that would make Fall cleanup easier. This does the trick! I blow all the leaves into a corner of the yard, then convert to the mulcher to suck everything up. I'll be looking at getting a larger bag for the mulch collection, as the stock bag tends to fill up pretty quickly. Aside from that, I am very pleased with this!
customer_reviews.author: LK

customer_reviews.title: Worked well...briefly
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine...for the first 7 times I used it. Now it will not start. I’ve tried all troubleshooting steps noted in the manual to no avail. Not sure it’s worth getting it serviced (closest service center is nearly 20min away). How soon will it break again after I get it fixed?
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Davis II

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for large yard cleanup!
customer_reviews.text: Be sure to have an extra long extension cord to go with this product, but this Vac/Mulcher works amazing for my backyard, I have to clean leaves from my yard every other weekend due to large eucalyptus trees, and this Vac saves me TONS of time! I can't imagine my life without this time saver. I also like that it's not overly loud, but you will definitely get dirty while using this machine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cannot put it together
customer_reviews.text: I have been trying for half an hour to put this together and cannot. The pictures and instructions are ridiculous. I will spend twenty more minutes, if I cannot get it together, I will send it back. If I get it together, I will try it out and adjust the 1 star rating. I get so fed up with companies that send a useless manual with their products. As a result, they get many orders returned.
customer_reviews.author: Arizona Snowbird

customer_reviews.title: High velocity and powerful leaf blower
customer_reviews.text: Great power and light weight. Multiple power settings for regulating air flow to meet your blower needs. The nozzle muzzle on the end of the wand restricts airflow a lot and I removed and threw it away. I haven’t used the vacuum function so can’t comment on that. This is a good powerful blower and good value for the money
customer_reviews.author: Randy chilton

customer_reviews.title: Strong blower
customer_reviews.text: Strong blower. It does the job. Vaccuum set up works well. Easily sucks up leaves. Caution around rocks, it will pick up some and will hit the fan blades hard. I suspect that can break the fan if allowed to happen often. I am happy with the product. Come fall I wont be racking and bagging leaves.
customer_reviews.author: Shadetree Engineer

customer_reviews.title: Beware of expensive leaf bags for vacuum attachment
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware! This model is the same leaf blower you get with other model#, but You pay extra for the recycle bag kit. The replacement bags are about $3.50 each and cost keeps going up. Kinda like buying a great printer only to have very expensive ink. So you are paying extra for something you will probably quit using.
customer_reviews.author: Rodger

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Amazingly powerful motor with two speeds. Up to 250MPH blowing for tough jobs. Balanced in your hand so it’s easy to use and maneuver. Suggestion: also pick up a 25’ or 50’ heavy duty extension cord and wire reel storage unit to easily store your extension cord Bayco KW-110 Cord Storage Reel with Center Spin Handle, 100-Feet,Orange
customer_reviews.author: Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Works great but the way the bag attaches is not practical
customer_reviews.text: I use this mainly for the vacuum and mulching function and this function works really well, even with large maple tree leaves. The unit is relatively light to use and holds comfortably. My only complain is that the black bag is rather awkwardly attached to the main unit. The attachment is very short. I find that I have to leave the bag dragging on the ground in order to use the vacuum comfortably. The other problem is that when you want to empty the bag, you need to lift the entire unit as well because the attachment is too short. Ideally the bag needs to be attached to the main unit via a flexible hose.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Kinda feels like a TOY
customer_reviews.text: Saves my back from more soreness! Don’t get me wrong it doesn’t have AUTO pilot, but close. I know some ppl blow leaves in a pile first, I prefer to just walk around, one less step. Either way, pretty fun, not a lot quicker but a lot less leaves and bending over. I wish they’d figure out Have a blow out mode, witH a cap at one end of bag for easier empty. Have to take off shoulders, unclip bag, unzip bag 3/4 way around and make sure you have it way down in the bag you’re dumping into.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Moore

customer_reviews.title: I'm glad I bought it
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with how this product works, both as a blower and a vacuum/mulcher. I wish the bag were a little bigger, but otherwise no complaints. I thought assembly of parts was easy to figure out and easy to switch between jobs. You do want to make sure you get to your leaves while they are dry as wet leaves clog things up.
customer_reviews.author: J. K. Given

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Piece of crap....worked exactly three times, then died. Never clogged or plugged, just stopped. I first thought the cord had come undone, but no, it just stopped in the middle of mulching & never went back on. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Rose J.

customer_reviews.title: Time savor
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing! I recently bought this in late fall and I wish I would have done it sooner. I have so many leaves to blow around and being able to mulch them is a life savor. It will suck up damp leaves but I have been careful not to let them clog up the tube. This will save me hours and hours of work next spring!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My favorite yard tool
customer_reviews.text: This one of the best yard tools I have ever purchased. I have used the blower yet but the vac is awesome. I also have the kit to attach it to a trash can. I filled two large trash cans today with leaves. It would have taken hours and hours to take and bag by hand. Instead it took a little over an hour. Now I have clean garden beds and a whole bunch of mulch!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica R Hammatt

customer_reviews.title: Really impressed
customer_reviews.text: I dont know much about Blower/Vac/Mulchers, but I have a ton of trees and this thing did a pretty solid job of mulching the leaves I had raked into piles. It did get clogged from time to time so i had to switch it off and shake the leaves out, and id say the mulching ratio is probably closer to 2:1 but it still made bagging the leaves easier, and now that ive gained some ground I think this will make it easier to keep up with the falling leaves.
customer_reviews.author: Alden

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this product. He has owned others but likes this one a lot. Good quality! Came quickly! Sturdy! I recommend it for sure!
customer_reviews.author: ADPH

customer_reviews.title: Powerful
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a blower/ vac to use on my open air rooftop which is a flat roof that covers the entire area of our penthouse= over 1500 sq ft. We have numerous plants and shrubs, some of which drop leaves and flowers. This is actually too powerful for my needs and only has 2 speeds, full on and twice full on. The changeover from the blower to the vacuum is fairly easy. The electric. cord is not a problem although I was looking for a battery operated unit.
customer_reviews.author: Blake Brown

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and efficient way to “rake”
customer_reviews.text: This worked like magic. We cut our “raking” time in half and use way less bags as it really does mulch the leaves nicely...not to mention it saves your back from doing the dreaded squat and lift of leaves over and over. We spent just as much time emptying the bag as vacuuming up leaves, but that is to be expected with the volume we were picking up. Highly recommend this product to make raking so much easier!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super great way to clean up leaves
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my best purchases ever I was able to vacuum up my leaves from my stone driveway and use the mulch in my garden. I am seventy six years old and it was actually easy. It even worked on wet leaves and spit the stones back out. It was a great purchase. I have not needed to use the blower yet but the vacuum is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: ginger Strain

customer_reviews.title: Black and Decker has NO CUSTOMER SUPPORT!
customer_reviews.text: Used this machine for one season. It quit working. Totally Dead! Called customer support, waited on the phone for an hour and then was purposefully cut off by B&D. I hope Amazon reads this review to help us get some resolution to this useless piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Vuxton

customer_reviews.title: great vacuum and mulcher
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it was vacuum and mulcher. I love it! it is a little heavier than lightweight but I am still able to everything I want. the cleanup is a breeze! I've used it twice now. I can't wait for all the leaves to fall so i can blow them into a pile and then vacuum them up. no more raking! I did have to find a youtube video to help with changing from a blower to a vacuum, because the instructions aren't that great
customer_reviews.author: margaret crawford

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price!
customer_reviews.text: With the steel fan, mulching is very easy and nothing (so far) has gotten stuck (like the last one I bought with a hard-plastic fan). Great upgraded product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It has been useful to me and i would buy it
customer_reviews.text: The device operates exactly as described and has had no glitches or malfunction. I am rather tall and using the shoulder strap makes it difficult to swing the device. Not using the shoulder strap ii is.easier to control but harder on the back. It has been useful to me and i would buy it again
customer_reviews.author: Ron Layman

customer_reviews.title: Very nice unit.
customer_reviews.text: Works great for sucking up leaves and mulching them. Heavy, but my wife can handle it fine. She only uses the first setting, which is the low one.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Wood

customer_reviews.title: This thing is a beast
customer_reviews.text: We have 10 million trees in our yard, and I bought this for the vacuum/mulching feature, mostly to clean up our pool deck. Instead, I've used it for the whole property. It will not suck up most of our pine cones, and definitely will not mulch them, but otherwise, this thing is a beast. I have no idea how it works as a blower, however, as I don't need it for that function and would rather use two separate items than switch back and forth on this.
customer_reviews.author: jenny o.

customer_reviews.title: Good replacement.
customer_reviews.text: Been through two leaf seasons and still going strong. Lots of oaks Near my patio. Chose this one for the metal blades, my previous version (motor failed) was another brand and had lasted 7 years, this one should last even longer. The shredded leaves are used as mulch in the garden. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Heather923

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum/mulcher for Fall
customer_reviews.text: This blower/vac worked well and mulched my leaves quickly. The assembly was fairly easy out of the box. The only downside was that the bag filled quickly and even with my small yard that has one tree I had to empty the bag 4 or 5 times.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany M.

customer_reviews.title: This thing sucks!
customer_reviews.text: very well! Have a 200ft pine tree in the back yard. This time of year needles are EVERYWHERE! Used the blower to get them into a corner of the yard, swapped it to vacuum and it all fit in the bag. Normally would take 3 black garbage bags
customer_reviews.author: Ray Logan

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised; quite powerful
customer_reviews.text: I've had this machine for a month, and have been pleased with it. The blowing function is quite powerful. It was easy to assemble, and it is fairly easy to interchange between the blowing and vacuum devices. The vacuum functions well on light-weight leaves and debris. It doesn't suck up the hickory nuts from my tree very well, but that's not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what it says on the side of the box. I've only used the vacuum mode so far but it takes care of leaves no problem and I haven't even cranked it to the second setting yet. I do wish the bag was a little larger, as I have a lot of area to cover with both front and back yards. The instructions were a little confusing at first, but I was able to assemble the product and get it working in a manner of minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Duerr

product_meta.title: BLACK+DECKER 3-in-1 Electric Leaf Blower & Mulcher with Leaf Vacuum Kit, 12-Amp (BV6000)
product_meta.description: The BLACK & DECKER BV6000 High Performance Blower/Vac/Mulcher features a 250 mph blower that blows through leaves and debris with ease. This unit is 50 percent Quieter for less noise during blowing (Maximum noise level compared to Black & Decker model LH4500 utilizing EN ISO 3744 sound measurement test procedure). A high impact metal fan prevents clogging when mulching, while grinding up to 16 bags of mulch down to one. It also has 2 speed selections for flower beds and powerful enough for matted leaves. The 12 amp motor 3 in 1 blower, vacuum and mulcher keeps the yard neat and tidy. This system allows for tool free changing between vacuum and blower in seconds and a built in cord retainer keeps the extension in place and plugged in for uninterrupted use. An easy empty reusable leaf bag design saves time and effort and includes 2 disposable bags: simply tie and toss for quick, easy cleanup. This blower is ideal for clearing driveways, sidewalks, decks and garages of debris and fall leaves from yard and the heavy duty vacuum is ideal for vacuuming leaves, grass clippings, twigs, pine needles and other lawn debris. Includes: (1) BV5600 Motor Head, (2) Disposable Leaf Bags, (1) Diffuser for use with Disposable Bags, (1) Detachable Shoulder Strap, (1) Concentrator, (1) Blow Tube, (1) Vacuum Tube, Reusable Bag Assembly. Do not operate blower/vac in a gaseous or explosive atmosphere. Motors in these units normally spark, and the sparks might ignite fumes.
feature_bullets: The 12 amp motor operates a 3 in 1 blower, vacuum and mulcher all in one
250 Miles per hour blower with 2 speed selections. Disposable leaf bag system

Weight 8.1 pounds. Blower ideal for clearing driveways, sidewalks, decks, and garages of debris and fall leaves from yard. Heavy duty vacuum is ideal for vacuuming leaves, grass clippings, twigs, pine needles, and other lawn debris
Can grind up to 16 bags of mulch down to one
Easy change between vacuum and blower. Includes Blow tube, Vacuum tube, EZ Empty reusable collection bag and concentrator

Air Speed: 180/250 Miles per hour; Bag: 1.5 Bushels; Decibels: 68 dBA; Included components: BV6000, 2 Disposable Bags, Diffuser for use with Disposable Bags, Detachable Shoulder Strap, Concentrator, Blow tube, Vacuum tube, Reusable bag assembly; Mulch ratio: 16:1; Power source: Electric; Type: Blower Vac

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars1,574 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
